name: Me Myself & Die
description:
Me Myself & Die is an isometric puzzle game where the goal is to orchestrate and manipulate your death to progress.

Each time you die, you leave behind a block - arrange these blocks to reach the exit! However, dying in the right place isn't always easy...

Currently in development for Android and PC. 

Feedback!
If you would like to give feedback, please use this link:
https://forms.gle/XL5uT4aADPQGQG2N6 
The same form accessible in-game via the feedback button!
